title: Animal Sounds
summary: Listen and guess animals by sounds.
description: - Set animal sounds as ringtones, as alarm melody & notification sounds;- Listen to a huge amount of sounds of different animals;- Play the game and guess animals by their voices;- 3 levels of difficulty in guessing;- 4 animals groups;- Each animal has image;- Kids mode;- Quick Search by name of the animal;- Constantly updated database of sounds;- Control animal sounds from your Android Wear;- Play animal sounds from your watch without starting application on phone. (can be used for pranks).List of animal sounds:Pig, Cow, Basset Hound, Cat, Cattle, Chicken, Doberman, Duck, Goose, Goat, Horse, Longhorn, Rooster, Sheep, Hog, Frogmouth, Bat, Bee, Canary, Cardinal, Crow, Eagle, Falcon, Finch, Hawk, Lapwing, Macaw Parrot, Mexican Red Parrot, Mockingbird, Mosquito, Nightingale, Owl, Peacock, Penguin, Pigeon, Red Lories, Seagull, South American Parrot, Vulture, Woodpecker, Whippoorwill, Aligator, Baboon, Bear, Camel, Capuchin Monkey, Chimpanzee, Cougar, Coyote, Elephant, Giant Anteater, Gibbon, Gorilla, Hippo, Lamb, Leopard, Lion, Lioness, Raccoon, Rhinoceros, Tiger, Wolf, Elk, Lemur, Panda, Snake, Toad, Zebra, Beluga Whale, Chipmunk, Cricket, Dolphin, Frog, Sealion, Rabbit, Donkey.
descriptionHTML:
- Set animal sounds as ringtones, as alarm melody & notification sounds;
- Listen to a huge amount of sounds of different animals;
- Play the game and guess animals by their voices;
- 3 levels of difficulty in guessing;
- 4 animals groups;
- Each animal has image;
- Kids mode;
- Quick Search by name of the animal;
- Constantly updated database of sounds;
- Control animal sounds from your Android Wear;
- Play animal sounds from your watch without starting application on phone. (can be used for pranks).


List of animal sounds:
Pig, Cow, Basset Hound, Cat, Cattle, Chicken, Doberman, Duck, Goose, Goat, Horse, Longhorn, Rooster, Sheep, Hog, Frogmouth, Bat, Bee, Canary, Cardinal, Crow, Eagle, Falcon, Finch, Hawk, Lapwing, Macaw Parrot, Mexican Red Parrot, Mockingbird, Mosquito, Nightingale, Owl, Peacock, Penguin, Pigeon, Red Lories, Seagull, South American Parrot, Vulture, Woodpecker, Whippoorwill, Aligator, Baboon, Bear, Camel, Capuchin Monkey, Chimpanzee, Cougar, Coyote, Elephant, Giant Anteater, Gibbon, Gorilla, Hippo, Lamb, Leopard, Lion, Lioness, Raccoon, Rhinoceros, Tiger, Wolf, Elk, Lemur, Panda, Snake, Toad, Zebra, Beluga Whale, Chipmunk, Cricket, Dolphin, Frog, Sealion, Rabbit, Donkey.

recentChanges: - Added the ability to use sounds as phone ringtone, alarm & notification sounds.
- Fixed bugs in Android Wear devices
